name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of 'real Emotion' performance by IRyS.
Song transition and guest reveal. Ninomae Ina'nis joins the stage.
Performance of 'Odorupu' (Oddloop) by IRyS and Ninomae Ina'nis.

subtitles.english: Leaving just for dancing

subtitles.english: Saying "I see, I see" to that

subtitles.original: お幸せについて問う
subtitles.english: Questioning about happiness

subtitles.original: 何が正義なんかって思う
subtitles.english: Thinking about what justice is

subtitles.original: 生意気そうにガム噛んで
subtitles.english: Chewing gum insolently

subtitles.original: それもいいないいなって思う
subtitles.english: Thinking that's nice too

subtitles.original: テレスコープ越しの感情
subtitles.english: Emotions through a telescope

subtitles.original: どこかに全部詰め込んだ
subtitles.english: Crammed them all somewhere

subtitles.english: I don't know a night without dancing
